remarks: Elimination of a conditional operator contained in a wff ` ch ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
statement:
elimifd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( if ( ps , A , B ) = A -> ( ch <-> th ) ) ) $.
elimifd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( if ( ps , A , B ) = B -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) ) $.
elimifd $p |- ( ph -> ( ch <-> ( ( ps /\ th ) \/ ( -. ps /\ ta ) ) ) ) $.
